author: Hey_Jimbo
body:
**New Investor seeking judgment on portfolio!**

Hello everyone, I've recently compiled a watch list of some stocks, ETFs, and a mutual fund. My ultimate goal is to generate long-term growth. Please give me any thoughts or critiques you may have. Thanks a million! 

Stocks: LULU, CPRT, MGRC, MSFT, ADBE, MA, PAYC, PFSI, NMIH | ETFs: FTEC, SCHG, SMH, SPYG | Mutual Fund: TRIRX

author: jpoms13
body:
Not to mention competitors like Paycom ($PAYC, I think) are taking business from them.

Full Disclosure: I hate Paychex. I’ve moved two companies away from their payroll services.

author: LearningtoCompound
body:
Fair Value Estimates For: TSLA, BYND, NFLX, ROKU, NVDA, AMD, AMZN, FB, XPEL, PAYC, SBUX, MSFT, BRK, WM, SHOP, ADBE, PTON, AAPL, COST

Has anyone worked on fair value estimates for any of these companies and is open to discussing it with someone who wants to learn the art from a professional?

I understand its the owners earnings that can be taken out of the business throughout its life discounted at the proper discount rate. But want to learn how different professionals are doing it so I can understand it better.

Thank you!

author: LearningtoCompound
body:
